==Chinese==

===Etymology===
Appears to refer to a kind of (red) jade originally, as suggested by their semantic parts and the explanations in ''{{w|Shuowen}}''.

Cognate with {{zh-l|梅槐|gloss=a tree similar to {{zh-l|*薔薇}}}}. Other potential cognates include {{zh-l|茅蒐|a red plant dye; madder}} and {{zh-l|韎韐|red madder-dyed knee covers}}.
